ERCode.Space.title=Expense report manager
ERCode.title.report=Expense report # ERCode.export=Export this expense report ERCode.create.report=Add a new expense report
ERCode.pdf.employee_signature=Employee signature ERCode.pdf.manager_signature=Manager signature
ERCode.expense_report=Expense report
ERCode.help.main=Expense report requires you to set the Organisation and Expense type applications so as to get a better user experience. ERCode.help.organisations=Set your organisations in the app and add the organisation field to the user's profile.\nThe company and the currency of each expense report will be filled automatically\n ERCode.help.type=Add expense types helps you to manage better your expenses by sorting them by category.\n
